history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_derive_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: Derive_correct,is_derive_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: Derive_correct,Ropp_mult_distr_l,is_derive_unique. qsimpl time: 1 use: Derive_correct,Ropp_mult_distr_l,is_derive_unique,Ropp_div. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rabs_Ropp,Derive_correct,Ropp_mult_distr_l,is_derive_unique,Ropp_div.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : R H : ex_derive f x Unable to unify "Derive ?M2363 ?M2364 = ?M2365" with "{l : R | derivable_pt_abs f x l}".

original: intros f x. apply is_derive_unique. apply Derive_correct. exists (- Derive f x). apply is_derive_Reals. intros eps eps_pos. unfold derivable_pt_lim. intros. exists (pos_div_2 eps eps_pos). intros h h_neq h_cond. simpl. rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_l. rewrite <- Ropp_div. rewrite Rabs_Ropp. specialize (H h h_neq h_cond).
